question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Atmospheric aerosols?
1) They can scatter and absorb solar and infrared radiation.
2) There are two types of aerosols – Natural aerosols and Anthropogenic aerosols.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Atmospheric aerosol can scatter and absorb the solar and infrared radiation. They can change the microphysical properties of the clouds. There are two types of aerosols – Natural aerosols and Anthropogenic aerosols.
